column5: John Grace, owner of Old Post Lodge on Lake St. Joseph, died in a boating accident yesterday.https://lfpress.com/news/local-news/...eadly-accidenthttps://oldpost.com/about-us/

sad news , article is very misleading. "killed" and "passed away" are 2 different things to me. until more info is released i dont think either of those words should be written. solo in a boat, could have been a heart attack or medical problem.

I have had the pleasure to know John Grace after staying at his camp several times. John was the eternal optimist and a great host to his guests. My thoughts and prayers go out to his wife Wendy and the 3 boys. RIP John.
john was a real great guy with wide interests and many talents. my best to his family and may he rest in peace
